Greetings! I am Muhammad Mubashar Ashraf, a dedicated second-year PhD student in Engineering. My primary research interests encompass Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), Biomechanics, Fluid-Structure Interaction (FSI), and advanced numerical modeling.
